name: Tri-Liminal
description:
Currently, a work-in-progress puzzler-esc minigolf mixed game. It has a few levels to showcase the game's simplicity and easy to grasp controls. It features five levels, a single song soundtrack, and an awesomely customized main menu by yours truly (everything was made by me but I like the main menu a lot) The game will feature way more levels and a whole lot more features! Some features would be pressure pads,  Fans, doors that need to be open by grabbing a key and the list goes on! I still have alot more to make and add like saving and loading, the esc menu sets up for this but doesn't have any functionality so far.

Donations are optional but I would love the support!
